---
title: "STV @ Palmerston North City Council"
---

There were two STV elections for Palmerston North City Council in 2019.

## Mayor

One seat elected from six candidates in one iteration.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/372569884" width="640" height="358" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## At Large

15 seats elected from 27 candidates in 68 iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/372570035" width="640" height="896" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
